module.name: udlg_progress

element.name: TdlgProgress.Text
element.short: Text message of the progress dialog

element.name: TdlgProgress.Min
element.short: Minimum value of the progress bar

element.name: TdlgProgress.Max
element.short: Maximum value of the progress bar

element.name: TdlgProgress.AllowCancel
element.short: Define if the task can be cancelled

descr.p: If True it will show the Cancel button.

element.name: TdlgProgress.Indeterminate
element.short: Set the progress bar as indeterminate position

element.name: TdlgProgress.ApplyDarkMode
element.short: Apply dark theme to the UI

module.short: Modal dialog to show progress of a process
